Third-Party Library List

This folder includes third-party libraries that are used by the Zii extension library for Yii. All these libraries are using licenses that are compatible to the BSD license used by Yii. This means you can safely use Zii and Yii for whatever purpose, provided you comply to the BSD license. Please refer to the detailed license information as shown below:

Library Name License Related Yii Component
jQuery UI 1.7.2 MIT JUI widgets (class name started with 'CJui')
